subSections.title: Glyph origin
Etymology 1
subSections.text:
Uncertain. Possibly related to {{cog|km|ពីរ||two}} or {{cog|lus|phîr||double; forked; twin}} ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}).

{{zh-ref|Wang (1982)}} considers it to be cognate with {{och-l|比|to compare; to match|id=1}}, {{och-l|媲|to match; to pair}}.

The meaning “four zhang of cloth” is probably a special application, but it is reminiscent of {{cog|sit-pro|*b-ləj||four}} ([[ibid.]]).

subSections.title: Readings
Counter
Usage notes
subSections.text:
* Depending on the preceding word, ''-hiki'' may change via [[euphony]] to become ''-biki'' or ''-piki''.
* The counter for larger animals, such as [[livestock]], is usually {{m|ja|頭|tr=tō||head}}.
